data.title: Report Month
data.definition: This field indicates the month by number reported for the message, e.g., 01 for January, 02 for February.

data.title: Corps Area
data.definition: This field indicates the Corps Tactical Zone of South Vietnam being reported, 1, 2, 3, or 4.

data.title: Detachment
data.definition: This field identifies the detachment reported.

data.title: Report Identification
data.definition: This group is the record identifier and contains the above three fields.

data.title: Mission Type 1
data.definition: This field contains a code for the first mission type reported.

data.title: Mission Type 2
data.definition: This field contains a code for the second mission type, if reported.

data.title: Mission Type 3
data.definition: This field contains a code for the third mission type, if reported.

data.title: UTM Coordinate
data.definition: This field indicates the UTM coordinate location of the detachment reported.

data.title: Location
data.definition: This field indicates the geographical location reported.

data.title: Province
data.definition: This field contains a code for a province.

data.title: Start Date
data.definition: This field indicates the year and month the mission started, e.g., 6801 for January 1968.

data.title: Update Date
data.definition: This field contains the Julian Date of the last update to the record.

data.title: Periodic Set One Identifier
data.definition: This field contains the periodic set identifier for periodic set one, troop disposition.

data.title: Troop Type
data.definition: This field identifies the troop type, e.q., USASF for U.S. Army Special Forces.

data.title: Officers/Units
data.definition: This field contains the number of officers for the Special Forces or for the units of other forces.

data.title: Enlisted/People
data.definition: This field contains the number of enlisted men for Special Forces or the total number of men for others.

data.title: Periodic Set 2 Identifier
data.definition: This field contains the periodic set identifier for period set two, i.e., operations. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: CIDG Operation
data.definition: This field identifies the operation as belonging to the CIDG. This field is not used after March 1967.

data.title: RF/PF Operation
data.definition: This field identifies the operation as belonging to the RF/PF. This field is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Operation Type
data.definition: This field identifies the operation type code. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Day Operations
data.definition: This field contains the number of day operations. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Night Operations
data.definition: This field contains the number of night operations. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Squad Operations
data.definition: This field contains the number of squad-sized operations.

data.title: Squad Days
data.definition: This field contains the number of days spent on squad operations. It was not used prior to January 1968.

data.title: Platoon Operations
data.definition: This field contains the number of platoon-sized operations.

data.title: Platoon Days
data.definition: This field contains the number of days spent on platoon operations. It was not used prior to January 1968.

data.title: Company Operations
data.definition: This field contains the number of company-sized operations.

data.title: Company Days
data.definition: This field contains the number of days spent on company operations. It was not used prior to January 1968.

data.title: Company-Plus Operations
data.definition: This field contains the number of operations greater than company in size. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Periodic Set 3 Identifier
data.definition: This field contains the periodic set identifier for period set three, contacts. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Contact Type
data.data_values: VCA: Viet Cong Attack; FOA: Friendly Offensive Attack; INC: Incident
data.definition: This field identifies the type of contact made with the enemy.

data.title: CIDG Initiate or Receive
data.definition: This field identifies CIDG as the initiator of the contact action or the force that was attacked by the enemy. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: RF/PF Initiate or Receive
data.definition: This field identifies RF/PF as the initiator of the contact action or the force that was attacked by the enemy. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Day Contacts
data.definition: This field contains the number of day contacts. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Night Contacts
data.definition: This field contains the number of night contacts. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Squad Contacts
data.definition: This field contains the number of squad-sized contacts with the enemy. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Platoon Contacts
data.definition: This field contains the number of platoon-sized contacts with the enemy. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Company Contacts
data.definition: This field contains the number of company-sized contacts with the enemy. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Company-Plus Contacts
data.definition: This field contains the number of contacts greater than the company in size. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Total Contacts
data.definition: This field contains the total number pf contacts with the enemy.

data.title: Periodic Set 4 Identifier
data.definition: This field contains the periodic set identifier for periodic set four, friendly losses. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Loss Type
data.data_values: KIA: Killed in Action; MIA: Missing in Action; WIA: Wounded in Action; WPN: Weapon
data.definition: This field indicates the type of friendly loss sustained.

data.title: USASF Losses
data.definition: This field contains the number of losses sustained by the USASF.

data.title: VNSF Losses
data.definition: This field contains the number of losses sustained by the VNSF.

data.title: CIDG Losses
data.definition: This field contains the number of losses sustained by the CIDG.

data.title: RF/PF Losses
data.definition: This field contains the number of losses sustained by the RF/PF.

data.title: Friendly Losses
data.definition: This group contains all the friendly losses.

data.title: Lost Weapons
data.definition: This field contains the number of weapons lost by all friendly forces, or total losses for LTYPE EQ KIA, WIA, MIA.

data.title: Periodic Set 5 Identifier
data.definition: This field contains the periodic set identifier for periodic set five, enemy losses. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Friendly Force Responsible
data.definition: This field indicates which of the friendly forces was responsible for the enemy loss. It is not used after March 1967.

data.title: Enemy KIA
data.definition: This field contains the number of enemy killed in action.

data.title: Enemy WIA
data.definition: This field contains the number of enemy wounded in action.

data.title: Enemy CAP
data.definition: This field contains the number of enemy captured.

data.title: Enemy Weapons
data.definition: This field contains the number of enemy weapons captured.

data.title: Enemy Losses
data.definition: This field contains all the enemy losses.

data.title: Enemy Suspects
data.definition: This field contains the number of enemy suspects interrogated. It is not used after March 1967.
